text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>2. Bey Herrn Euler dem Buchbinder am Rheinsprung ist zu erfragen, wo folgende Bücher zu raisonablem Preiß zu haben seyen : <BIBL><TITLE>Janii & Tremellii Biblia cum Annotationibus</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><TITLE>Acta Eruditorum Lipsiensia</TITLE> de An. <YEAR>1738</YEAR>. & <YEAR>1739</YEAR>.</BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Mohemii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>institutiones histor. Christ.</TITLE> maiores <VOLUME>1. Seculi</VOLUME>, samtl. in <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>.</BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Titus Livius</TITLE> ex Editione <AUTHOR>Joannis Clerici</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Ovidii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Tristiam & Epistolae ex Ponto</TITLE> mit <AUTHOR>Sinceri</AUTHOR> Anmerckungen</BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Herodianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Bocceri</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Elianus</AUTHOR> Graece & Latine cum notis <AUTHOR>Schefferi</AUTHOR></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Schrevelii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon Graeco Latinum & Lat. Graec.</TITLE></BIBL>; <BIBL><AUTHOR>Nisselii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Biblia Hebraea</TITLE></BIBL>; und <BIBL><AUTHOR>Buxtorfii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE></BIBL>, samtl. in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>.</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":4,"explanation":"Fixed 4 issues: 1) Corrected \"B√¼cher\" to \"Bücher\" (proper German umlaut), 2) Corrected \"Prei√ü\" to \"Preiß\" (proper German eszett), 3) Corrected \"4t√≤\" to \"4to\" (standard book format abbreviation), 4) Corrected \"8v√≤\" to \"8vo\" (standard book format abbreviation). Also moved the final BIBL closing tag to properly enclose only the Buxtorfii Lexicon entry, with the format specification applying to all the 8vo books mentioned at the end."}
